entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entire page glitches when using Shell #17157
  • On Maui Android, page dimennsions are always empty #17154
  • Maui ~ MediaElement: audio file playback does not reset to beginning after playing back once in Anddroid emulator but works correctly in Windows app #17153
  • Numeric Entry uses wrong decimal separator in MAUI app running on Android #17152
  • Maui on windows emulator dont do Swipe like it do on Android emulator #17151
  • Missing XAML element content in release version but not debug version #17149
  • A new class created in Platform/Android folder of .NET MAUI project will have wrong namespace #17148
  • Method not found: void Microsoft.Maui.Controls.TapGestureRecognizer.add_Tapped(System.EventHandler) in .Net MAUI targeting .Net 7 #17147
  • Cannot directly type culture (e.g. 'en-US') for a CultureInfo property in .NET MAUI XAML #17146
  • Maui android Shell.PresentationMode="Modal" bug when rotate the device #17145
  • MediaElement Record Audio #17144
  • Clean up the `<UseRidGraph>` usage #17142
    .NET 8 GA
  • [tests] Investigate why tabbed page navigated event fires earlier #17141
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7] Entry Numeric keyboard type is not working #17137
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] System.TypeLoadException with .NET 8 #17136
    .NET 8 GA
  • Button With Gradient Backgroud and Shadow is not visible on iOS #17135
  • NullReferenceException in Platform.DidAppear on iOS when migrating from Xamarin Forms. #17133
  • [iOS] Button in ScrollView has NO clicked effect #17132
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid App Crushes after splash Screen on Android Release Mode #17131
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Maui Hybrid App stuck on "Loading..." in release mode on Android #17130
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] - AndroidMessageHandler - Cannot access a disposed object #17129
    .NET 8 GA
  • Button text does not clear on iOS using button.Text = "" or button.Text = null #17128
  • CollectionView's scroll is not continuous #17127
  • Migration from Xamarin to MAUI - Title bar is not coming in children pages and tabs pages #17126
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc1] Grid rows aren't same height on iOS #17125
    .NET 8 GA
  • Out of box support for read and write Exif data on all platforms. #17124
  • TableSection and TableRoot Title properties are displayed as lower case on Windows. #17123
  • [Android] - Cursor Resets to the Beginning When Typing Letters with TextTransform #17122

Closed

  • PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #16978
  • XAML Hot Reload not working for Android after Visual Studio Update to 17.6.4 #15842
  • AutomationProperties not working in release mode #16491
  • MediaPicker.CaptureVideoAsync() returns null on Android API 33 (Android 13.0) #16879
  • Fix all cases where platform values are propagating to xplat code to use SetValueFromRenderer #16654
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] TwoWay Binding does not work when value is changed from the source ViewModel #16849
    .NET 8 GA
  • Inconsistent content length calling WCF service #16957
  • Entry background color does not change when two radio buttons change event. #17053
    .NET 8 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Add a second set of borders to the Border Resize Content sample #17158
  • PermissionStatus: Remove "ios only" from documentation of Restricted #17156
    community ✨
  • Drag and Drop move suppression for older android builds #17150
    platform/android 🤖, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [tests] Ignore appium visual test #15330 while we investigate #17143
    area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 branch #17139
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Update BindableObject API docs #17138
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17119
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update BindableObject API docs #17099
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Run the API diff against stable versions #17118
    8.0-rc1
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #17103
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [C] 2W bindings always apply #17110
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1901.177 to 1.0.1938.49 #17059
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17121
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Add .NET 7 to the NuGet packages #17048
    Under Consideration
  • [main] Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17043
    Under Consideration
  • [net8.0] Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17042
    Under Consideration
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.7.0 #16888
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Remove the explicit RID on Mac Catalyst samples #16765
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, Under Consideration
  • Update Windows App SDK #16610
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, Under Consideration
  • Test PR for Android label spans Frame and new UI Tests #16228
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, control-label, control-map, control-editor, Under Consideration
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Change the impl of the event handler to use a notification center to avoid circular refs. #15064
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, control-editor, Under Consideration
  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
    area/platform, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Update Page API docs #16981
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
